{{Wired embedded system |brand=Banana Pi |model=BPI M2 |revision=S (V1.0) |asin=B0BS1G8CHR |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SinoVoIP |price=100 |est_release_date=12/2022 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB (Type-C) Female |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S922X (A311D) |cpu1_cspeed=1.8-2.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=6 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLMAG1JETD-B041 |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=Rayson |ram1_model=RS1G32L04D2BDS-53BT |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8111H |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;2;,,, 3A, 500KHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8113B;;1;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy;SY8120B;;1;,,, 26V, 6A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8756;;2;,,, Ultra Low Dropout 500mA CMOS LDO;Will Semiconductor;WL2803E;;3;,,, 300mA Low Dropout RF Linear Regulator;SGMicro;SGM2032;;1;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Array;SemTech;RClamp0544T;;2;, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.1, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, I2C, I2S, SPI, UART, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2015.01; |stock_os=Linux;4.9.421;Ubuntu 20.04.1; |tp_firmware=Debian, Armbian, Android 9 |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=pi |default_pass=bananapi }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - Banana Pi BPI-M2S}} :[https://www.banana-pi.org/en/banana-pi-sbcs/97.html Product page]
===Links=== *[https://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-M2S ''Banana Pi BPI-M2S'' on '''BPi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/12/20/96-banana-pi-bpi-m2s-amlogic-a311d-s922x-sbc-offers-dual-gbe-optional-poe-and-wifi-5/ ''Banana Pi BPI-M2S Amlogic A311D/S922X SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/hexa-core-banana-pi-bpi-m2s-packs-a-neural-processor-and-dual-lan-for-100/ ''Hexa-core Banana Pi BPI-M2S packs a neural processor and dual LAN'' on '''Lilliputing''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S922X (A311D) (64-bit ARM) :SoC: Quad-core (Cortex-A72) @2.2GHz :+ Dual-core (Cortex-A53) @1.8GHz :NPU: 5.0 TOPS @800MHz *GPU: ''Mali-G52 MP4'' @800MHz (AFBC, DX12, :OpenGL ES3.2, OpenVG1.1, OpenCL 2.0) *Storage: 16GB (eMMC) Flash, :TF card (max.256GB)/MMC Card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) RAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB Type-C (OTG) ports *Network: 2x 1GbE port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C :or optional 802.3af PoE
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/Banana Pi models}}
